IEEE Approved Draft Standard Design Tests for High-Voltage (&amp;#x003E;1000 V) Fuses and Accessories

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Required procedures for performing design tests for high-voltage distribution class and power class fuses, as well as for fuse-disconnecting switches and enclosed single-pole air switches, are specified. These design tests, as appropriate to a particular device, include the following test types: dielectric, interrupting, load-break, radio-influence, short-time current, temperature rise, time-current, manual operation, thermal-cycle, bolt torque, and liquid tightness.
